name: Sundarbans
description: Explore the world's largest mangrove forest and spot Bengal tigers, crocodiles, and unique wildlife.

name: Cox's Bazar
description: Enjoy the longest natural sandy beach in the world with vibrant sunsets and thrilling water sports.

name: Saint Martin's Island
description: Visit the only coral island in Bangladesh, renowned for its crystal-clear turquoise waters and colorful marine life.

name: Rangamati
description: Discover the scenic beauty of the Chittagong Hill Tracts, lush green hills, and picturesque Kaptai Lake.

name: Sylhet
description: Experience the tea gardens, beautiful waterfalls, and explore the vibrant culture of Sylhet.

name: Kuakata
description: Witness breathtaking sunrises and sunsets over the Bay of Bengal from the pristine beach of Kuakata.

name: Bandarban
description: Explore the hill town of Bandarban, home to diverse tribal communities, waterfalls, and adventurous trekking trails.

name: Shat Gombuj Mosque
description: Visit the Sixty Dome Mosque in Bagerhat, a UNESCO World Heritage Site and an architectural marvel of the medieval period.
